SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardResource, CardStarter
public abstract class Card extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a generic card in the game. Specific card types extend this class and provide concrete implementations for methods.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getCardColor

      public abstract Artifacts getCardColor()
      Abstract method to get the color of the card.
      Returns:
      The color of the card as an enum Artifacts.

    • getPoints

      public abstract int getPoints()
      Abstract method to get the points of the card.
      Returns:
      The points of the card.

    • getCorners

      public Map<CornerOrientation,Corner> getCorners()
      Returns all corners of the card.
      Returns:
      A map containing all corners of the card.

    • getCorners

      public Map<CornerOrientation,Corner> getCorners(boolean faceUp)
      Returns corners of the card based on whether they are face up or face down.
      Parameters:
      faceUp - If true, returns face-up corners; if false, returns face-down corners.
      Returns:
      A map containing the corners of the card based on the faceUp parameter.

    • countPoints

      public abstract int countPoints(CardMap cardMap, Coordinates coordinates, boolean faceUp)
      A generic card gives you points only if is placed faceUp. For CardStarter always returns 0, for CardResource can be either 0 or 1, while for CardGolden calculate the points using the game rules.
      Parameters:
      cardMap -
      coordinates -
      faceUp -
      Returns:
      the points due to a specific card placement

    • getAllArtifacts

      public abstract Map<Artifacts,Integer> getAllArtifacts(boolean faceUp)
      This method work in the same way for all the types of card if is placed faceUp, while is different if placed face down. For CardStarter the attribute centralArtifacts contains the back artifacts, instead for CardResource the back artifact is always the same as cardColor.
      Parameters:
      faceUp -
      Returns:
      a Map which represents the total amount of Artifacts on the choosen side

    • isPlaceable

      public boolean isPlaceable(CardMap cardMap)
      For CardResource and CardStarter this method returns always true, because these cards don't have constraints to play the card, while for CardGolden checks if the constraints are satisfied or not.
      Parameters:
      cardMap -
      Returns:
      true if the card is placeable on both faces, false if can be placed only face down

    • getCornerArtifact

      public Artifacts getCornerArtifact(CornerDirection direction, boolean faceUp)
      Parameters:
      direction -
      faceUp -
      Returns:
      the Artifact one the required corner

    • getCornerType

      public CornerType getCornerType(CornerDirection direction, boolean faceUp)
      Parameters:
      direction -
      faceUp -
      Returns:
      CornerType of the required corner.

    • toRecord

      public abstract CardRecord toRecord()
      Abstract method to convert the card into a CardRecord for data transfer purposes.
      Returns:
      A CardRecord representing the card.

    • toRecord

      public abstract CardRecord toRecord(boolean faceUp)
      Abstract method to convert the card into a CardRecord for data transfer purposes. Includes the option to specify whether the card is face up or face down.
      Parameters:
      faceUp - Whether the card is recorded as face up or face down.
      Returns:
      A CardRecord representing the card with the specified faceUp status.
